QuestData.Title: Shipwrecked Sailors
QuestData.Description:
<The gilblin and makrura of Mak'rana have captured the forsaken sailors from the nearby shipwreck.>
<It looks like the sailors are being poisoned and worse. Best to put them out of their misery.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Put $1oa Queen's Reprisal Sailors out of their misery.
QuestData.RewardText: <In the end, it was all for the best.>
